posts.post_content:
I'm following a three-drop with a Moon Heron  
Moon Heron, Moon Heron  
Beatin' over blockers with a Moon Heron  
Moon Heron, Moon Heron  
  
And if I ever mull my hand  
Down to five, don't draw lands  
Oh if I ever mull my hand  
Oh, iii-ooo-iii, iii-iiif...  
I won't curve out, no more.

Posted By: Minus_Prime (9/22/2011 6:20:58 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Heartbreakingly beautiful, art and flavor text alike. Helped set the mood of the set perfectly.  
  
Strange and wonderful that something this haunting, dear, and deep would come from the same artist who painted a couple unremarkable leylines.  
  
Artist's website is http://www.angelfire.com/id/hawkrune/
